text:
So we have reached
the final lecture

of this class which
will also conclude

our study of discrete
time, finite state space

We will first review the
steady-state behavior

Then, we are going to talk
about a classical application

of Markov chains to analyze
the design of a phone system.

And finally, we will
see how we can calculate

to do with the behavior
of Markov chains

over a finite time horizon as
opposed to in the long run.
